intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Minolta SR (MC & MD) lenses roughly organized by topic.

lensSpecLinks.name: Dennis Lohmann's Minolta Lens specs table
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (The definitive Minolta SR mount spec table created by Dennis Lohman and the inspiration for this site)

lensSpecLinks.name: Lens Writeups at Artaphot.ch
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Note: Most lens pages have links to great comparison tests; much of the content is in German, but Google Translate works well here)

lensSpecLinks.name: MINOLTA - Tabella comparativa produzione obiettivi manualfocus' by Massimo Scotti
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Note: image-based text is in Italian, so Google Translate isn't as helpful here)

mountHistLinks.name: A great visual writeup by Dennis Lohmann showing/explaining the different Minolta Lens Versions
mountHistLinks.helpText: (Scroll below the lens specs table to see the 'Lens Classification' section)

mountHistLinks.name: RED Baileyâ€™s Minolta Collection
mountHistLinks.helpText: (A historical timeline of all Minolta & Chiyoda Kogaku lenses made for the SR mount)

mountHistLinks.name: 'A Brief History of Minolta lenses' at Rokkorfiles.com

reviewLinks.name: Minolta Lens Guide at Artaphot.ch
reviewLinks.helpText: (Comprehensive resource with subjective analysis and comparisons covering nearly all Minolta lenses. Note: Most content is in German, but Google Translate works well here)

reviewLinks.name: Minolta Lens Reviews at Lens QA Works
Minolta Lens Reviews at Casual Photophile
reviewLinks.helpText: (High quality articles but unfortunately only covering a handful of Minolta Lenses. Highly recommended also for their camera reviews and other articles)

reviewLinks.name: Minolta Lens Reviews and Lens Tests at Vintage Lens Reviews
Minolta MC/MD Articles/Reviews at Phillip Reeve.com
The rated List of Minolta MD/MC Lenses on the Sony a7' by Phillip Reeve
Lens Performance Tests by Dennis Lohmann
MC and MD lens tests in Dutch photography magazines

repairLinks.name: Lens Disassembly Guides by Matt Bierner on YouTube
Some Minolta SR lens repair guides preserved by Dennis Lohmann
repairLinks.helpText: (Original text is in Japanese, but Google Translate can help with that)

repairLinks.name: Minolta Camera & Lens manuals preserved by M. Butkus
A list of some free Minolta manuals

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)

miscLinks.name: A list of Minolta OEM lens shades for SR-mount lenses by Dennis Lohmann
